headline.main: PETAIN REMOVES 17 IN COUNCIL PURGE; Adds 20 to National Body to Give It a Character More Representative of Regime

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 3 -- By the addition of twenty names and the elimination of seventeen, membership in the National Council of Marshal Henri Philippe Petain's advisory body, which is filling the place of the somnolent Parliament, was altered today to give it a character more representative of the new regime.
abstract: 20 names added, 17 removed, from Natl Council, to give it character repr of regime
